parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon DataZone domain.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Specifies the status of the subscription requests.

nested_items.name: items
nested_items.description: The results of the ListSubscriptionRequests action.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when a subscription request was created.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The Amazon DataZone user who created the subscription request.

nested_items.name: decisionComment
nested_items.description: The decision comment of the subscription request.

nested_items.name: domainId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Amazon DataZone domain in which a subscription request exists.

nested_items.name: existingSubscriptionId
nested_items.description: The ID of the existing subscription.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The identifier of the subscription request.

nested_items.name: metadataFormsSummary
nested_items.description: The summary of the metadata forms.

nested_items.name: formName
nested_items.description: The form name of the metadata form.

nested_items.name: typeName
nested_items.description: The type name of the metadata form.

nested_items.name: typeRevision
nested_items.description: The type revision of the metadata form.

nested_items.name: requestReason
nested_items.description: The reason for the subscription request.

nested_items.name: reviewerId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the subscription request reviewer.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the subscription request.

nested_items.name: subscribedListings
nested_items.description: The listings included in the subscription request.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the published asset for which the subscription grant is created.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The identifier of the published asset for which the subscription grant is created.

nested_items.name: assetListing
nested_items.description: The asset for which the subscription grant is created.

nested_items.name: assetScope
nested_items.description: The asset scope of the subscribed asset listing.

nested_items.name: assetId
nested_items.description: The asset ID of the asset scope.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: The error message of the asset scope.

nested_items.name: filterIds
nested_items.description: The filter IDs of the asset scope.

nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the subscription request was updated.

nested_items.name: updatedBy

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: When the number of subscription requests is greater than the default value for the MaxResults parameter, or if you explicitly specify a value for MaxResults that is less than the number of subscription requests, the response includes a pagination token named NextToken. You can specify this NextToken value in a subsequent call to ListSubscriptionRequests to list the next set of subscription requests.
